typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Master_Audit_ID as string,
	Category as string,
	AuditLayer as string,
	SourceType as string,
	DestType as string,
	StartTimeStamp as string,
	EndTimeStamp as string,
	Error as string,
	RestartFlag as string,
	Status as string
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AbcDummySrc
AbcDummySrc derive(Master_Audit_ID = $Master_Audit_ID,
		Audit_Category = $Category,
		Audit_Layer = $AuditLayer,
		Source_Type = $SourceType,
		Target_Type = $DestType,
		Batch_Start_Timestamp = $StartTimeStamp,
		Batch_End_Timestamp = $EndTimeStamp,
		Error = $Error,
		Restart_Flag = $RestartFlag,
		Status = $Status) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Master_Audit_ID,
		Audit_Category,
		Audit_Layer,
		Source_Type,
		Target_Type,
		Batch_Start_Timestamp,
		Batch_End_Timestamp,
		Error,
		Restart_Flag,
		Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ABCInfoFilter
ABCInfoFilter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[('abc_main.csv')],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Master_Audit_ID,
		Audit_Category,
		Audit_Layer,
		Source_Type,
		Target_Type,
		Batch_Start_Timestamp,
		Batch_End_Timestamp,
		Error,
		Restart_Flag,
		batch_status = Status
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ABCMainInfo
